This game is so so so good. As someone who has previously ever heard about the Half Life franchise, I can say with certainty that it does live up to all the praise it gets.
Half-Life but 2, go play it or you are not gaMING ga,ers gamnsig fmigansiavv gaaminds moment

Dear Valve, 

 I've understood that you don't want to be the company that we once new and loved. We support you on your decisions and future plans. Please for the LOVE OF GOD JUST FINISH THE STORY TO HALF LIFE 2, I will literally get on my knees and beg just for you guys to make Half life 3. Like I want to lay on the floor and cry its that bad. I love you as a company and developers but please, please, please, please, please, make a conclusion to the game.
It's really clunky and you'll reload save points a million times. But great game for the year it was made!
Great expirience, you should 100% try it out.

Amazing game. One of my top favorites, except for the fact that i dislike some of the puzzles and have to no-clip to get past them. If you're not a puzzle person, you can still enjoy this game even though some of the puzzles are irritating. 

Must-Have for every steam library
half life 2 holds up really well, easier to get into than HL1, though i haven't played Black Mesa.
my favorite game of all time!
